short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Appends a filter to Adobe Stock URLs to remove Gen AI from results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically adds a filter to your Adobe Stock searches to exclude generative AI content. Whenever you're browsing Adobe Stock, itâ€™ll append &filters%5Bgentech%5D=exclude to the URL, so you don't have to manually adjust the filter.

Permissions:
The extension only asks for permission to access Adobe Stock URLs so it can modify them. It runs locally and does not collect any personal data.
